Docs.summary: Converts a to the value of the inner object.

Docs.param: The object to do nothing to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method does nothing to the value because <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.SetValue%2A> can accept the value without modification.
